page.title: 06LAW & ORDER - BURGHFIELD
page.content: The Police Training College trains Policemen over a period of time. They have a residential fourteen week course. The course includes learning to swim and physical fitness. The policemen have an inspection to keep them up to standard. They have to polish their toe caps until they can see their faces in it. In the main building they have a museum. They have badges and police hats dating from 1902. They had gasmasks and uniforms from the second world war. The helicopter is flown by civilian pilots and is used for security and surveillance. They have a close circuit television centre for security and making safety films. These films are sent to the schools. Local school children are used in the films along with policemen from the college.
